skills.label: Create and modify databases
items: Create a blank desktop database, create a database from a template, create a database by using import objects or data from other sources, delete database objects

skills.label: Manage relationships and keys
items: Create and modify relationships, set the primary key, enforce referential integrity, set foreign keys, view relationships

skills.label: Navigate through a database
items: Navigate specific records, create and modify a navigation form, set a form as the startup option, display objects in the navigation pane, change views of objects

skills.label: Protect and maintain databases
items: Compact a database, repair a database, back up a database, split a database, encrypt a database with a password, recover data from backup

skills.label: Print and export data
items: Print reports, print records, save a database as a template, export objects to alternative formats

skills.label: Create tables
items: Create a table, import data into tables, create linked tables from external sources, import tables from other databases, create a table from a template with application parts

skills.label: Manage tables
items: Hide fields in tables, add total rows, add table descriptions, rename tables

skills.label: Manage records in tables
items: Update records, add records, delete records, append records from external data, find and replace data, sort records, filter records

skills.label: Create and modify fields
items: Add fields to tables, add validation rules to fields, change field captions, change field sizes, change field data types, configure fields to auto-increment, set default values, using input masks, delete fields

skills.label: Create a query
items: Run a query, create a crosstab query, create a parameter query, create an action query, create a multi-table query, save a query

skills.label: Modify a query
items: Rename a query, add fields, remove fields, hide fields, sort data within queries, format fields within queries

skills.label: Create calculated fields and grouping within queries
items: Add calculated fields, set filtering criteria, group and summarize data, group data by using comparison operators, group data by using arithmetic and logical operators

skills.label: Create a form
items: Create a form, create a form from a template with application parts, save a form

skills.label: Configure form controls
items: Move form controls, add form controls, modify data sources, remove form controls, set form control properties, manage labels, add sub-forms

skills.label: Format a form
items: Modify tab order, configure print settings, sort records by form field, apply a theme, control form positioning, insert backgrounds, insert headers and footers, insert images

skills.label: Create a report
items: Create a report based on the query or table, create a report in design view, create a report by using a wizard

skills.label: Configure report controls
items: Group and sort fields, modify data sources, add report controls, add and modify labels

skills.label: Format a report
items: Format a report into multiple columns, add calculated fields, control report positioning, format report elements, change report orientation, insert header and footer information, insert images, apply a theme
